entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning late this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
